casinogame.name: Slot Machine
casinogame.description: Classic slot machine game with 3 reels and 1 payline.

casinogame.name: Blackjack
casinogame.description: Popular card game where the goal is to beat the dealer's hand without going over 21.

casinogame.name: Roulette
casinogame.description: Classic casino game where players bet on which number or color the ball will land on the spinning wheel.

casinogame.name: Video Poker
casinogame.description: Poker game played on a computerized console, similar to a slot machine.

casinogame.name: Baccarat
casinogame.description: Popular card game where players bet on the outcome of two hands: the 'player' and the 'banker'.

casinogame.name: Craps1
casinogame.description: Dice game where players bet on the outcome of the roll of two dice.

casinogame.name: Texas Hold'em1
casinogame.description: Popular variant of poker where players are dealt two private cards and five community cards, and aim to make the best hand possible.

casinogame.name: Keno1
casinogame.description: Lottery-style game where players choose numbers from a pool, and winners are determined by a random number generator.

casinogame.name: Wheel of Fortune
casinogame.description: Game of chance where players spin a large vertical wheel and win prizes based on where the wheel stops.
